modShortDescription: An Override to Punishing Weather - Core mod. Adds more rain conditions so its rainy more often (but not 100% every day).
modDescription:
An Override to Punishing Weather – Core mod. Adds more rain conditions so its rainy more often (but not 100% every day).

**Requires Mod:** [Punishing Weather – Core](https://7daystodiemods.com/punishing-weather-core/)

## Changelog

Updated for textual bug fix to modinfo.xml and other files.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a19/tree/main/Doughs-PunishingWeather-Rain-More)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
